title: Mia's 30th Candlelight Supper Menu
description: Create polished menu for backyard birthday dinner with three courses

conversation.content:
Please turn my rough notes into a classy dinner menu for my backyard 30th birthday

Event: Mia's 30th Candlelight Supper
Vibe: Cozy early-autumn; backyard string lights; 14 guests
Dietary: No peanuts; Jess is vegetarian

Selected Courses:
✓ First bite: Roasted squash + apple soup
✓ The big plate: Red wine–braised short ribs on parmesan polenta
✓ Sweet ending: Brown butter apple crisp + vanilla bean ice cream

Style: Warm, tempting descriptions that match the cozy autumn atmosphere
I'll help you create a beautiful menu for Mia's 30th birthday celebration. Let me find an appropriate template that will showcase your autumn-inspired three-course dinner.

actions.title: Browse Templates
actions.description: Searching Microsoft template gallery for elegant menu templates

conversation.content: Perfect! I found the 'Basic menu' template which has a clean, elegant design ideal for your intimate dinner party. It has a warm aesthetic that will complement your autumn theme. Let me load this template now.

The template has loaded successfully. It features a sophisticated brown modern design that will work beautifully for your candlelight supper. Now I'll analyze its structure to identify the content sections.

actions.title: Analyze Template Structure
actions.description: Identifying content sections in the menu template

conversation.content: Now I'll customize the template with your three selected courses. I'll write warm, tempting descriptions that capture the cozy autumn atmosphere and highlight the special touches in each dish.

actions.title: Fill Menu Content
actions.description: Populating template with menu items and descriptions

conversation.content: Let me capture screenshots of the completed menu so you can see how it looks.

actions.title: Capture Final Menu
actions.description: Taking screenshots of the completed bistro menu

conversation.content:
Your menu for Mia's 30th Candlelight Supper is complete! The menu beautifully presents your three-course autumn dinner:

✓ First Bite: Roasted squash & apple soup with warm, comforting flavors
✓ The Big Plate: Red wine-braised short ribs on parmesan polenta (with vegetarian option for Jess)
✓ Sweet Ending: Brown butter apple crisp with vanilla bean ice cream

Each dish has a tempting description that captures the cozy autumn atmosphere. The elegant brown design complements your candlelight setting perfectly. The menu is ready to print for your 14 guests!
